headline.main: WILLKIE RALLIES HIS PARTY ON WAR; Urges Republicans Take Lead in Fight for Repeal of the Neutrality Law WILLKIE RALLIES HIS PARTY ON WAR

lead_paragraph: Weadell Willkie, asserting that the time has come for new and more united action, called upon the Republican party last night to assume the leadership of a fight to repeal the Neutrality Act. He made his appeal in an address at a dinner of the National Republican Club at the Hotel Waldorf-Astoria in honor of Viscount Halifax, British Ambassador to the United States.
abstract: Pub opinion on Adm policy discussed by Willkie and Amb Halifax, ss to Natl Repub Club
